db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates providing custom vertex data from C++ and QML.

# Copyright (C) 2022 The Qt Company Ltd. # SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(customgeometry LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
set(INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR "${INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR}/quick3d/customgeometry")
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(customgeometry main.cpp )
set_target_properties(customgeometry PROPERTIES WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(customgeometry PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(customgeometry URI CustomGeometryExample VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES Main.qml TorusMesh.qml SOURCES examplegeometry.cpp examplegeometry.h RESOURCES qt_logo_rect.png RESOURCE_PREFIX "/qt/qml" IMPORTS QtQuick3D )
install(TARGETS customgeometry RUNTIME DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" BUNDLE DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" LIBRARY DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" )
